levels.levelDescription: Welcome to the Enchanted Grove, a lush forest filled with mystical energies. The dark-grass under your feet whispers ancient secrets, while the shimmering waters present a serene challenge to your journey.

Ascend the Crystal Peaks, where snow blankets the towering mountains in a dazzling display. Be wary of the deep dark holes that threaten to swallow the unwary traveler as you navigate this icy terrain.

Descend into the depths of the Shadowed Abyss, where the ground trembles with the heat of molten lava. The grey brick platforms offer a precarious path as you face the malevolent presence of the Shadow King, the dark lord of Mystic Lands.
